othercustomfield.description: Created 11/2022 by MDIMKOV This field is used to reflect the main tax registration number on subsidiary level, which is later used on invoice and credit memo templates; values in this field are entered manually for more information please contact milcho.dimkov@scenic.eu

othercustomfield.label: Main Tax Registration Number
